page.title: 19The E in WombournE
page.content: For many years the correct spelling of Wombourne has been in doubt.Many of the older residents do not use the E. They say this is the older and correct way to spell it. However other residents claim the opposite is true. The signs near the village support both views:some of them have the E,some do not. They were erected by the County Council over a number of years. In July 1985 the signs began to change.By night unknown persons painted over the E in white so changing the name to Wombourn. Others added an E to some of the signs without one! The local radio station was alerted. Radio WM interviewed local residents, the post office staff, the police and the clerk to the Parish Council.We are not any wiser. So, today,although many residents live in WOMBOURNE some live in WOMBOURN!!!!!
